text: Digital eMation, Inc. (Korean: 디지탈이메이션(주)) is an animation studio in Seoul, South Korea. It was founded in 1993. They specialize in traditional animation and digital animation. == Works == * Alias * Bless the Harts * Johnny Test (Season 1 alongside Top Draw Animation) * Team Galaxy" * Seth MacFarlane's Cavalcade of Cartoon Comedy * The Venture Bros. * Time Squad (Season 1) * The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy (Seasons 3–6) * Billy & Mandy's Big Boogey Adventure * Dante's Inferno * Horseland (2006) * Xiaolin Showdown (episodes: Like a Rock, Katnappe, Chameleon, Night of the Sapphire Dragon, Big as Texas, Mala Mala Jong, Citadel of Doom, Pandatown, The Sands of Time, Master Monk Guan, Screams of the Siren, The return of Pandabubba, The Demon Seed, The Apprentice, Dangerous Minds, Saving Omi, Finding Omi, The Life and times of Hannibal Roy Bean, Treasure of the Blind Swordsman, The Return of Master Monk Guan, Chucky Choo, Hannibal's Revenge, Time After Time part 2) * Evil Con Carne * Robotboy * The Casagrandes (2019) * Family Guy (season 6+) * Franklin and the Turtle Lake Treasure * Batman: The Brave and the Bold * Super Duper Sumos * The Cleveland Show * The LeBrons * The Loud House: The Louds' First Movie (with Jam Filled Entertainment, Mercury Filmworks, Bardel Entertainment, Snipple Animation, Yeson Animation Studios and Nick Digital) * The Loud House Movie (with Jam Filled Entertainment, Mercury Filmworks, Bardel Entertainment, Snipple Animation, Yeson Animation Studios, Screen Novelites, Stoopid Buddy Stoodios, Yowza! Animation, Mighty Animation, Digitoonz Media & Entertainment, Titmouse, Inc., and Nick Digital) * Martin Mystery * The Wacky World of Tex Avery (1997) * Miraculous Chibi * Scooby-Doo series ** Scooby-Doo! Abracadabra-Doo ** Scooby-Doo! Camp Scare ** Scooby-Doo! Legend of the Phantosaur ** Scooby-Doo! Music of the Vampire ** Big Top Scooby-Doo! ** Scooby-Doo! Spooky Games ** Scooby-Doo! Haunted Holidays ** Scooby-Doo! Mask of the Blue Falcon ** Shaggy & Scooby-Doo Get a Clue! ** Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated (second season) ** Be Cool, Scooby-Doo! ** Scooby-Doo and Guess Who? * Tom and Jerry series ** Tom and Jerry: Back to Oz ** Tom and Jerry: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory * Stretch Armstrong and the Flex Fighters * Megas XLR (second season) * Gravity Falls (episodes: Headhunters, The Hand that Rocks the Mabel, Dipper vs. Manliness, Irrational Treasure, Fight Fighters, Summerween, Boss Mabel, Boyz Crazy, and Land Before Swine) * Totally Spies! * The Secret Saturdays * The 7D[Citation needed] (alongside Toon City) * Over the Garden Wall * Dawn of the Croods * Young Justice: Outsiders * Animaniacs (2020) (Season 2 alongside Saerom Animation) == References == # Believe Entertainment Group's 'The LeBrons' (2012-05-21). title: Digital eMation
